revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Wacan |image = [[File:Wacan.png]] |caption = Energy from lightning strikes is drawn into the plant, making the Berries grow big and rich. The same energy promotes the growth of nearby Berries. |growtime = 30m 0s |harvest = 2 berries |replant = 5% |points = 250 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *15 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Wacan''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Iapapa]], at least 1 [[Qualot]], at least 1 [[Pinap]] and at least 1 [[Grepa]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! !! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 0-10s || 10-180s || 180-900s || 900-1800s || 1800-3600s |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:WacanTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:WacanTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:WacanTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Wacan berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] |- | [[File:Qualot.png|30px]] [[Qualot]] || || [[File:Grepa.png|30px]] [[Grepa]] || || [[File:Qualot.png|30px]] [[Qualot]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || || [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] |- | [[File:Grepa.png|30px]] [[Grepa]] || || [[File:Qualot.png|30px]] [[Qualot]] || || [[File:Grepa.png|30px]] [[Grepa]] |}
